section.title: Valve.VR.Extras.SteamVR_ForceSteamVRMode Class Reference

para.para: This is an example class of how to force steamvr initialization. You still need to have vr mode enabled but you can have the top sdk set to None, then this script will force it to OpenVR after a second

section.title: Detailed Description
